edu.upenn.cis.ppod.model
Class PPodVersionInfoInterceptor

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.EmptyInterceptor
      edu.upenn.cis.ppod.model.PPodVersionInfoInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.hibernate.Interceptor
public class PPodVersionInfoInterceptor
extends org.hibernate.EmptyInterceptor

Assign a new PPodVersionInfo to any PPodEntitys that are marked as being newly saved or modified and to any null members of CharacterStateMatrix.getColumnPPodVersionInfos()

PPodEntitys are marked for a new PPodVersionInfo by having a null pPodVersionInfo field.

Author:
Sam Donnelly
See Also:

initializePPodVersionInfo

private void initializePPodVersionInfo()
In a temporary session, grab the next available pPOD version number, assign it to PPodVersionInfoInterceptor#pPodVersionInfo, increment it, and save (but not commit) it to the database.

setPPodVersionInfoIfAppropriate

private boolean setPPodVersionInfoIfAppropriate(java.lang.Object entity,
                                                java.lang.String[] propertyNames,
                                                java.lang.Object[] currentState)
This method does two things:
  1. If entity is an IPPodEntity and has "pPodVersionInfo".equals(properyNames[n]) with currentState[n] == null, then assign PPodVersionInfoInterceptor#pPodVersionInfo to currentState[n].
  2. If an entity is a CharacterStateMatrix then assign all CharacterStateMatrix.getColumnPPodVersionInfos() w/ a null value to PPodVersionInfoInterceptor#pPodVersionInfo. It does this by picking out "columnPPodVersionInfos".equals(propertyNames[n]) and operating on (List<PPodVersionInfo>) currentState[n].

Parameters:
entity - being saved or updated
propertyNames - property names of the entity
currentState - the about to be saved or updated
Returns:
true if we modify currentState, false otherwise

setSessionFactory

public PPodVersionInfoInterceptor setSessionFactory(org.hibernate.SessionFactory sessionFactory)
Set the session factory for this interceptor to use.

Parameters:
sessionFactory - the session factory
Returns:
this
